de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.measurement

Class MeasurementToolContributionsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.measurement.MeasurementToolContributionsHandler

  • public class MeasurementToolContributionsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles creation searching, loading and instantiation of all available measurement tools. They are loaded through Eclipseâ€™s extension point API. The measurement tools need a public zero argument constructor for the instantiation.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableMeasurmentTools

        public java.util.List<MeasurementTool> getAvailableMeasurmentTools()
        Scans the measurement tools extension point for available measurement tools.
        Returns:
        All available measurement tools. Each call returns new instances of the measurement tools.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If an instance of any measurement tool could not be created for any reason, e.g. because the measurement tool has no public zero argument constructor or because a MeasurmentToolClass provided via the extension point is not implementing MeasurementTool.
